title: Underground River Temple Adventure #101
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ancient Temple Entrance
rooms.description: A massive stone entrance carved into the underground cavern wall. Torches flicker in iron sconces, casting dancing shadows on walls covered with ancient hieroglyphs. The air is cool and damp, and you can hear the distant sound of rushing water echoing through the passages. A heavy iron gate blocks the way forward.

items.name: weathered stone altar
items.description: An ancient altar with carved symbols and a shallow basin

items.name: ancient copper key
items.description: A key shaped like a water droplet, covered in green patina

items.name: stone offering box
items.description: A locked stone box with intricate carvings of waves and fish

items.name: temple chronicle tablet
items.description: A clay tablet with ancient writing
items.text: Chronicle of the River Temple: Built in the year 842 by High Priest Aquarius. The temple honors the three sacred guardians: the Serpent of the Deep, the Keeper of Currents, and the Spirit of the Spring. Only those who know the founding year may pass the first gate.

items.name: hieroglyphic wall carvings
items.description: Ancient carvings depicting temple rituals and water ceremonies
items.text: The carvings show priests performing rituals by an underground river. One section depicts the High Priest Aquarius holding a staff, with the date 842 carved prominently beneath his feet.

items.name: explorer's supply chest
items.description: A wooden chest left by previous explorers, with two compartments

items.name: explorer's journal
items.description: A leather journal with recent entries
items.text: Day 3: We've reached the temple entrance. The gate requires the founding year as a combination. Day 5: We found references to 842 everywhere. The High Priest's name was Aquarius. Day 7: We need to find the Crystal of Tides in the Sacred Vault to complete our expedition.

items.name: oil torch
items.description: A sturdy torch that provides light in dark passages

items.name: coil of rope
items.description: Strong rope useful for climbing or securing items

items.name: heavy iron gate
items.description: A massive gate with a combination lock mechanism showing three rotating dials

rooms.name: Underground River Chamber
rooms.description: A vast cavern where an underground river flows through the center, its waters glowing with a faint blue luminescence. Ancient stone bridges cross the water, and carved pillars rise from floor to ceiling. The sound of rushing water fills the chamber. Three large statues stand along the walls, and a sealed door leads deeper into the temple.

items.name: statue of the Serpent
items.description: A towering statue of a coiled serpent with sapphire eyes
items.text: Inscription: 'I am the Serpent of the Deep, guardian of the temple's foundation. I dwell in the darkest waters where light cannot reach.'

items.name: statue of the Keeper
items.description: A statue depicting a robed figure holding a staff with flowing water
items.text: Inscription: 'I am the Keeper of Currents, guardian of the temple's flow. My domain is the sacred river that runs through these halls.'

items.name: statue of the Spirit
items.description: A graceful statue of a figure emerging from water
items.text: Inscription: 'I am the Spirit of the Spring, guardian of the temple's source. I protect the eternal wellspring from which all waters flow.'

items.name: carved stone pedestal
items.description: A pedestal in the center of the chamber with a locked compartment

items.name: scroll of the guardians
items.description: An ancient scroll describing the temple's protectors
items.text: The Three Guardians: The Serpent dwells in the darkest waters. The Keeper watches over the sacred river. The Spirit protects the eternal wellspring. Together they guard the Crystal of Tides in the Sacred Vault.

items.name: rocky river bank
items.description: The edge of the glowing underground river

items.name: silver key
items.description: A key made of tarnished silver with wave patterns etched into it

items.name: ancient stone table
items.description: A table carved from a single piece of stone, with three drawers

items.name: ritual instruction tablet
items.description: A stone tablet with ceremonial instructions
items.text: Temple Ritual: To enter the Sacred Vault, one must answer the three sacred questions. The number of guardians (3) repeated thrice (333) unlocks the drawer containing the Crystal Key.

items.name: crystal key
items.description: A translucent key that glows with inner light, shaped like a water crystal

items.name: sealed vault door
items.description: A massive door carved with images of water and guardians. Three questions are inscribed on a bronze plaque.

password_questions.question: Who built this temple?
password_questions.hint: Check the temple chronicle and wall carvings in the entrance

password_questions.question: Where does the Serpent dwell?
password_questions.hint: Read the inscription on the Serpent statue

password_questions.question: What do the guardians protect?
password_questions.hint: The explorer's journal and guardian scroll mention this

rooms.name: Sacred Vault of the River Temple
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the temple! The Sacred Vault is a circular chamber with walls of polished stone that shimmer like water. In the center, on a pedestal of pure crystal, rests the legendary Crystal of Tides - a massive gem that pulses with blue light and seems to contain an entire ocean within its depths. Ancient murals depicting the temple's glory cover the ceiling. A shaft of light from above illuminates a stairway leading to the surface.

items.name: Crystal of Tides
items.description: A magnificent crystal the size of a human head, containing swirling blue energy that looks like captured ocean waves

items.name: crystal pedestal
items.description: A pedestal made of flawless crystal that seems to grow from the floor itself

items.name: ceiling murals
items.description: Beautiful paintings showing the temple's construction and the three guardians
items.text: The murals depict High Priest Aquarius founding the temple in 842, the three guardians being summoned to protect it, and the Crystal of Tides being placed in this vault as the temple's greatest treasure.

items.name: ornate treasure chest
items.description: A chest filled with ancient coins, jewels, and artifacts from the temple's glory days

rooms.win_message: You have discovered the legendary Crystal of Tides! As you lift the ancient artifact, the three guardian statues in the river chamber glow with approval. The crystal's power illuminates a hidden stairway leading to the surface. You have solved the mysteries of the Underground River Temple and claimed its greatest treasure. You win!
